channel.title: Slice n Dice *UPDATED*
channel.description:
[left] [size=14pt]Day: 2[/size] Slice n Dice The Next Step in Pking
Server Stage: Beta Client Version: v0.1 Beta Test @[size=13pt][b]slicendice.zapto.org[/b][/size]
*This is a solo project.
[u][b]12/19:[/b][/u] [b]Content:[/b] -Re-vamped the Woodcutting skill (Check it out, probably the best version of this skill you've ever seen on an Allstar) -Re-made the Mining skill (Check it out, probably the best version of this skill you've ever seen on an Allstar) -Pink rocks now give rune ess -Added Dramen tree to woodcutting
[b][u]12/20:[/u] Content:[/b] -Re-made the Fishing skill (Check it out, probably the best version of this skill you've ever seen on an Allstar) -Set correct item prices from the General, Scimitar, Crafting, Food, and Magic stall [i]-still have to finish the tea, fish, vegetable, silk, silver, fur, spice, gem, seed, and market stalls[/i] -Added/Removed a few objects at home -Added new area -Added 90% objects to new area
[b]Bug Fixes Etc:[/b] -Magic on NPCs has been fixed -Attacking and using magic on NPCs on cheat clients has been fixed -Added a timer when eating, slightly faster than RS because you need it that way on Allstars :) -Fixed a couple foods that didn't work and now every single food item in RS 2006 works properly with all correct values (with an exception of a select few that are released in the game for a specific purpose)
[u][b]12/21:[/b][/u] [b]Content[/b] -Tweaked thieving -Made bone beads exchangeable to 2 NPC's at the home area. You can exchange (if at the req. crafting level) bone beads for bones, big bones, jogre bones, and dragon bones. A new way for skillers to be involved with the prayer market.
[b][u]12/22:[/u][/b] [b]Content:[/b] -Added 90% farming [with almost all tool req.] for only herbs at the moment ( more will be added at seperate farming patches). -Added 95% mithril seed planting (just need to add dialogue to 'Pick' or 'Leave' flowers with the appropriate actions afterward).
[b]Green = Complete Orange = In-progress Red = Not started[/b]
[b][size=12pt]Melee:[/size][/b] ●
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122082216/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Ranging:[/size][/b] ●
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122182528/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Magic:[/size][/b] ●
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img][b][size=12pt]Prayer:[/size][/b] ●
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122191028/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Mining:[/size][/b] ●
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122232122/runescape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Smithing:[/size][/b] ●Smelting - 15% ●Smithing - 30% [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [b][size=12pt]Woodcutting:[/size][/b] ●Cutting all trees - 85% ●All usable hatchets - 95% ♦Trees can be cut down and respawn on a timer
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122200319/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Fletching:[/size][/b] ●
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214504/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Firemaking:[/size][/b] ●
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120123002212/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Fishing:[/size][/b] ●
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122233049/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Cooking:[/size][/b] ●Raw Fish - 80% ●Other Foods - 0% [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2zhgqdz.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Agility:[/size][/b] ●Gnome Stronghold Course - 90% ●Barbarian Course - 0%
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122231156/runescape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Crafting:[/size][/b] ●Leather Tanning/Crafting - 50% ●Dragonhide Tanning/Crafting - 30% ●Amulets - 0% ●Gem Cutting - 40%
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [b][size=12pt]Thieving:[/size][/b] ●Pick-Pocketing NPCs - 80% ●Chests & Stalls - 50%
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122213351/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Farming:[/size][/b] ●
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122235048/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Herblore:[/size][/b] ●
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214707/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Slayer:[/size][/b] ●
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122223429/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img] [b][size=12pt]Runecrafting[/size][/b] ●Abyss - 50% ●Pouches - 0%
[IMG]http://runecentre.com/img/news/scroll.gif[/img] [size=12pt][b]Misc. Notes:[/b][/size] ●Donator System - 60% ●Dicing System - 75% ●Prestige System - 0% ●Fun PK - 50% ●Custom Skill - 0%
I am currently looking for Site/Forums Developers Most importantly I need constant suggestions and ideas for the content that will end up being used.
[/left]

item.title: Slice n Dice *UPDATED*
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[left]
[size=14pt]Day: 2[/size]
Slice n Dice
The Next Step in Pking

Server Stage: Beta
Client Version: v0.1
Beta Test @[size=13pt]slicendice.zapto.org[/size]

*This is a solo project.

12/19:
Content:
-Re-vamped the Woodcutting skill (Check it out, probably the best version of this skill you’ve ever seen on an Allstar)
-Re-made the Mining skill (Check it out, probably the best version of this skill you’ve ever seen on an Allstar)
-Pink rocks now give rune ess
-Added Dramen tree to woodcutting

12/20:
Content:
-Re-made the Fishing skill (Check it out, probably the best version of this skill you’ve ever seen on an Allstar)
-Set correct item prices from the General, Scimitar, Crafting, Food, and Magic stall
-still have to finish the tea, fish, vegetable, silk, silver, fur, spice, gem, seed, and market stalls
-Added/Removed a few objects at home
-Added new area
-Added 90% objects to new area

Bug Fixes Etc:
-Magic on NPCs has been fixed
-Attacking and using magic on NPCs on cheat clients has been fixed
-Added a timer when eating, slightly faster than RS because you need it that way on Allstars
-Fixed a couple foods that didn’t work and now every single food item in RS 2006 works properly with all correct values (with an exception of a select few that are released in the game for a specific purpose)

12/21:
Content
-Tweaked thieving
-Made bone beads exchangeable to 2 NPC’s at the home area. You can exchange (if at the req. crafting level) bone beads for bones, big bones, jogre bones, and dragon bones. A new way for skillers to be involved with the prayer market.

12/22:
Content:
-Added 90% farming [with almost all tool req.] for only herbs at the moment ( more will be added at seperate farming patches).
-Added 95% mithril seed planting (just need to add dialogue to ‘Pick’ or ‘Leave’ flowers with the appropriate actions afterward).

Green = Complete
Orange = In-progress
Red = Not started

[size=12pt]Melee:[/size]
●

[size=12pt]Ranging:[/size]
●

[size=12pt]Magic:[/size]
●

[size=12pt]Prayer:[/size]
●

[size=12pt]Mining:[/size]
●

[size=12pt]Smithing:[/size]
●Smelting - 15%
●Smithing - 30%
[size=12pt]Woodcutting:[/size]
●Cutting all trees - 85%
●All usable hatchets - 95%
Trees can be cut down and respawn on a timer

[size=12pt]Fletching:[/size]
●

[size=12pt]Firemaking:[/size]
●

[size=12pt]Fishing:[/size]
●

[size=12pt]Cooking:[/size]
●Raw Fish - 80%
●Other Foods - 0%
[size=12pt]Agility:[/size]
●Gnome Stronghold Course - 90%
●Barbarian Course - 0%

[size=12pt]Crafting:[/size]
●Leather Tanning/Crafting - 50%
●Dragonhide Tanning/Crafting - 30%
●Amulets - 0%
●Gem Cutting - 40%

[size=12pt]Thieving:[/size]
●Pick-Pocketing NPCs - 80%
●Chests & Stalls - 50%

[size=12pt]Farming:[/size]
●

[size=12pt]Herblore:[/size]
●

[size=12pt]Slayer:[/size]
●

[size=12pt]Runecrafting[/size]
●Abyss - 50%
●Pouches - 0%


[size=12pt]Misc. Notes:[/size]
●Donator System - 60%
●Dicing System - 75%
●Prestige System - 0%
●Fun PK - 50%
●Custom Skill - 0%

I am currently looking for Site/Forums Developers
Most importantly I need constant suggestions and ideas for the content that will end up being used.

[/left]
